description: Arrange irreducible polynomials over GF(2) in lexicographic order and write down the order of each polynomial.
references: R. Lidl and H. Niederreiter, Finite Fields, Addison-Wesley, 1983.
links: Polynomial order: computes the order of an irreducible polynomial over a finite field F_p.
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Feb 03 2001
